titles.title: Merit Systems Protection Board Administrative Judges Protection Act of 1995
To provide that certain hearings functions of the Merit Systems Protection Board be performed only by administrative law judges, and for other purposes.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 6/30/1995--Introduced. Merit Systems Protection Board Administrative Judges Protection Act of 1995 - Amends Federal civil service law to: (1) eliminate the status of "administrative judges of the Merit Systems Protection Board (MSPB)" (who are subject to removal, suspension, and performance appraisal by their agency on their hearing and decision-making functions); and (2) deem certain existing MSPB administrative judges to be administrative law judges (who are not subject to such agency action).
